column3: Latest;Kampong Chhnang: A------ woman gave birth on a ferry from Kampong Chhnang to Siem Reap on June 5
column5: the pregnant women and her family were travelelingd from Kompong Chhnang province to give birth at Siem Reap Provincial Hospital
column6: and took the ferry across the river in Kampong Leng district. The  28 year old went into labour and suddenly had the baby before the boat docked.------The woman and baby were taken to Kompong Chhnang health center
column7: where the newborn was declared healthy with a weight of 3 kilograms. ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/310884
